hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select ta.ID_,ta.CID_,ta.CDATE_,ta.MID_,ta.MDATE_,ta.UUID_, ta.cate,ta.title,ta.ispicnews,ta.status_,ta.times,tb.value from core_news ta left join core_basicdata tb on tb.value2 = ta.cate and tb.name='news'
select count(*) as ds from core_news
select ta.ID_,ta.CID_,ta.CDATE_,ta.MID_,ta.MDATE_,ta.UUID_, ta.cate,ta.title,ta.content,ta.ispicnews,ta.status_,ta.times from core_news ta where ta.ID_ = :id
update core_news set MID_ = :mId, MDATE_ = sysdate(), cate = :cate, title = :title, content = :content, ispicnews = :ispicnews where ID_ = :id
update core_news set status_ = :status_ where ID_ = :id
update core_news set times = :times where ID_ = :id
